summary: This is an email from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim to Christian Everdell and others, providing a courtesy copy of an ECF filing in the U.S. v. Maxwell case. It demonstrates ongoing legal proceedings and communication between defense counsel and prosecutors.

persons.name: Bobbi Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell sending a courtesy copy of an ECF filing to prosecutors in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Recipient of the email containing a courtesy copy of a legal filing in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.

connections.description: Defense attorney communicating with prosecutor regarding case filings in U.S. v. Maxwell.
Defense attorney copying other legal professionals on case-related communication.

events.title: ECF Filing in Maxwell Case
events.description: A legal filing was submitted electronically in the U.S. v. Maxwell case, referenced in the attached document.

keyFacts: The email shows ongoing legal proceedings in U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330) as of April 2021.
Bobbi Sternheim, as defense counsel, is providing courtesy copies of filings to prosecutors including Christian Everdell.
The communication indicates formal legal correspondence between defense and prosecution teams.
